data.text: @MaryGR65 @Helen_biochem @longcovidadvoc1 @jjschoch Thanks for heads up. Following me so I’ve just blocked
@Helen_biochem @longcovidadvoc1 @jjschoch People might want to check if he's following you!!! https://t.co/PijxHwIp39
@Helen_biochem @longcovidadvoc1 @jjschoch Yes he followed me too and I blocked him. I forgot to take a screenshot of it to pass on 👍
@longcovidadvoc1 At this point anyone that isn't recognizing the extreme pathogenicity of the nucleocapsid protein is just yanking your chain.

@Inge_V ... Increasing drug resistance (it's used for malaria). He's also not qualified which is a serious issue. Artemesinin can also upset the gut microbiome - so you need to know what you're doing & take responsibility if you are recommending this is a protocol en masse.

@Inge_V He won't say what's in the protocol until the book is out. Yet it seems to stem around artemesinin - yet there are problems with this esp if its the synthetic derivative. It's not licensed in Europe or N. America, there's concern that malarial parasites develop resistance...
@longcovidadvoc1 Rather than having long covid, it sounds more like he had covid and then recovered 🤷🏻‍♀️

@longcovidadvoc1 Thank you for the warning, i was in a conversation with this guy, who claims to have fully healed because of plant based medicine. But he didn't say which medications he took. So I lost interest. Gonna RT this warning.
@longcovidadvoc1 @jjschoch Ps. I've already blocked this account.
@longcovidadvoc1 @JJSchoch is the twitter handle to check for
